hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{11}{:}{\blueE{55}}$ is $\blueE{55}$ ticks from $\redD{11}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost to 12. The long minute hand points to 11. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f319c0ff7f391a47dc0fd27615f9cdb687d21a3)

Notice the hour hand is past $11{:}00$ but not quite to $12{:}00$.

$\redD{11}{:}{\blueE{05}}$ is $\blueE{5}$ ticks from $\redD{11}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 11. The long minute hand points to 1. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ff9bba0aa95758a0a78fcb316a16bc9f86781c3b)

$\redD{12}{:}{\blueE{55}}$ is $\blueE{55}$ ticks from $\redD{12}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 1. The long minute hand points to 11. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5c16879cb6d3b4677ac775b96c40b8c993d6460c)

Notice the hour hand is past $12{:}00$ but not quite to $1{:}00$.

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$11{:}55$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 12. The long minute hand points to 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/be5ea57f929934e0a224afdef246906e3bc258ba)
$11{:}05$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 11. The long minute hand points to 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ced7c14f7ef0c74947be1a829e239827569abceb)
$12{:}55$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 1. The long minute hand points to 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e1352d8532250d58fcbc6e19bbe30f5f685127e2)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 11. The long minute hand points to 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/be5ea57f929934e0a224afdef246906e3bc258ba)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 12. The long minute hand points to 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ced7c14f7ef0c74947be1a829e239827569abceb)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost at 1. The long minute hand points to 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e1352d8532250d58fcbc6e19bbe30f5f685127e2)
